Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler

Interface ServerHeloReplyHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ServerReplyHandler
    public interface ServerHeloReplyHandler
extends ServerReplyHandler
    Handler for HELO command response.

    This handler receives the server's response to a HELO command. HELO is used for basic SMTP without extensions. On success, the handler receives a ClientSession interface for continuing the session.

    Note that after HELO (as opposed to EHLO), no extensions are available, so STARTTLS and AUTH are not possible.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    ClientSession, ServerEhloReplyHandler

      • Methods inherited from interface org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler.ServerReplyHandler

        handleServiceClosing

    • Method Detail

      • handleHelo

        void handleHelo​(ClientSession session)
        Called when the server accepts HELO (250).

        No extensions are available with basic SMTP. The handler can proceed directly to sending mail via session.mailFrom().

        Parameters:
        session - operations available in the established session

      • handlePermanentFailure

        void handlePermanentFailure​(java.lang.String message)
        Called when the server rejects HELO (5xx).

        This indicates the server will not accept connections from this client. The connection will be closed.

        Parameters:
        message - the server's rejection message
